name: To Be A King - Volume 1
description:
So many choices but only one general - you. Romance one, multiple, or perhaps even all of the fairest ladies in the kingdom! …Or maybe ride solo?



Choose your political allies and enemies, make strategic decisions, and navigate royal politics as you meet the most interesting people in the kingdom.



Help tip the scales in your or someone else`s favor. Who is guilty and who is innocent? Uncover conspiratory plots and use them to your advantage.



Will you command respect or fear?
Intellect and charm or deception and cunning. There are many ways to outplay your opponents and attract the maidens



Take your rightful place on the throne and bask in love or lust. Find your true love or enslave all damsels to endless lustful nights. With over 5800 renders, 36 lewd scenes and 10 love interests you can re-experience the game in multiple ways. The power is yours, the choice is yours.
